message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you still get a decent amount.  Accept and we're done!
That's a bit greedy Alice! How about a more even split? This is my best offer.
Okay, I'll compromise a bit.  But this is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
Alice, let's be reasonable. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most efficient way to settle this. Don't let greed make us both losers!
